question: Find all users located in New York
sql: SELECT users.Id, users.DisplayName, users.Location FROM users WHERE users.Location = 'New York'
cypher: MATCH (users:users) WHERE users.Location = 'New York' RETURN users.Id, users.DisplayName, users.Location

question: Show all badges with class 1
sql: SELECT badges.Id, badges.Name, badges.UserId FROM badges WHERE badges.Class = 1
cypher: MATCH (badges:badges) WHERE badges.Class = 1 RETURN badges.Id, badges.Name, badges.UserId

question: List posts with post type 1
sql: SELECT posts.Id, posts.Title, posts.CreationDate FROM posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1
cypher: MATCH (posts:posts) WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 RETURN posts.Id, posts.Title, posts.CreationDate
